data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Thandar, Ahmed, Arumugam, Preyan (2011): A new family within the holothuroid order Dactylochirotida with description of a new species from South Africa and comments on the dendrochirotid genus Neoamphicyclus Hickman, 1962 and the molpadid genus Cherbonniera Sibuet, 1974 (Echinodermata). Zootaxa 2971: 40-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.204574
